## Description
The Compact Quarters hosts 12 basic beds and small desks.

|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Living|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|6.0 x 9.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|125|
|Power Demands:|2.0 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.2 kW|
